item.description:
We're at it again in February and this time we're headed back to Back Bay.

Thanks so much to those who were able to join us last month at Scholars. Thanks to a great response we doubled our attendance from the previous month. Can we double again?

Remember we are trying to let Boston know who really lives here. Come out and be visible with us! Invite you're friends and colleagues --and anyone interested in creating more inclusive social spaces here in The Hub, especially in the after-work crowd. That includes White allies who understand our larger mission.

Fact: Boston is 47% White and 53% Black, Latino,Asian, Native American and everything else outside of and in between. And we all work live and play here.


For more information email us at visibleinboston@gmail.com. To get on the mailing list send subject "Add to Mailing List".

Follow us on Twitter @visibleinboston
item.name: Friendly Takeover w/ Visible In Boston - Feb. 2013
